artist: Painter: After Alessandro Tiarini; Delineator: Francesco Rosaspina; Engraver: Antonio Marchi
description: Saint Catherine with marks of stigmata on hands and feet, supported by and angel on right; standing before an alter; skull on alter and crucifix above; angel on left placing a kneeling pillow on alter step
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

below image in black: A. Tiarini dip.   Fran. Rosaspina del.  Ant Marchi inc. / ESTASI DI S. CATERINA DA SIENA  | on sheet in pencil: 2-472
title: Estasi di S. Catherina da Siena
